questions.question: Am I a candidate for lipedema surgery?
questions.answer: Candidacy is determined during the initial assessment. We evaluate the degree of lipedema, your overall health, goals, and expectations. Not all cases require surgery; some are managed with conservative therapy.

questions.question: What does the initial assessment include?
questions.answer: The consultation includes: complete medical history, detailed physical examination, diagnosis explanation, review of therapeutic options (conservative and/or surgical), answers to all your questions, and delivery of a personalized plan.

questions.question: What is the comprehensive plan like (before and after)?
questions.answer: Before: preparation with clear instructions, coordination of studies if applicable, and education about the procedure. After: follow-up with scheduled check-ups, physical therapy (drainage, compression), care instructions, and continuous optimization.

questions.question: Do you see international patients? How do we coordinate the trip?
questions.answer: Yes, we see patients from abroad. We coordinate via WhatsApp: assessment, recommended stay schedule, pre-trip instructions, and remote post-procedure follow-up. We accompany you every step of the way.

questions.question: Where is the consultation and how do I schedule via WhatsApp?
questions.answer: The consultation is in Bogotá (Centro Médico de la Sabana, Usaquén). To schedule, send a WhatsApp message with your name, city/country of origin, and reason for consultation. The team responds to coordinate an available date.
